'''Fuufuu Whirlwind Kick''' is an [[Character Card Elemental Skill|Elemental Skill]] for [[Sayu (Character Card)|Sayu]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

This skill is executed automatically 1 turn after [[Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash (Character Card Skill)|Yoohoo Art: Fuuin Dash]].
